price: Na tumezilinda na kila shetani afukuzwaye.
footnotes: Lakini Sisi tumezihifadhi na kila shetani anaye stahiki kupigwa vimondo na kufukuzwa kwenye rehema ya Mwenyezi Mungu Mtukufu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
